title: morphalr
text: Load data parcels city Rouen 1827 extract segments (lines) polygons. morphal_geom_to_segment() can applied LINESTRING, e.g. case streets modeled lines. Compute orientations segments East looking perpendicular parameters.
code: # transform polygons as segments (lines) linerouen <- morphalr_geom_to_segment(sfobject = rouen_1827, to = 'LINESTRING') orientationsest <- morphalr_segment_orientation(sfsegments = linerouen, looking = 'E', perpendicular = TRUE)  orientationsest |>   ggplot() +   geom_sf(aes(color = orientation)) +   scale_color_viridis_c() +   theme_bw() +   theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(), axis.text = element_blank(), panel.grid = element_blank())

title: morphalr
text: Example distance minimal bounding rectangle (DSR):
code: rouen_1827 |>   morphalr_dsr() |>   ggplot() +   geom_sf(aes(fill = dsr), color = 'grey90', linewidth = 0.05) +   scale_fill_viridis_c(direction = -1) +   theme_bw() +   theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(), axis.text = element_blank(), panel.grid = element_blank())

title: morphalr
text: Compute indices. Create HCA clustering plot result:

title: morphalr
text: Cartography clusters:  Summary clusters mean center-scale values variables cluster.
code: morphalr_clusters(sf = rouen_with_indices, clustering = clusterrouen, cutting = 6) |>   ggplot() +   geom_sf(aes(fill = cluster), color = 'white', linewidth = 0.02) +   ggthemes::scale_fill_colorblind() +   theme_bw() +   theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(), axis.text = element_blank(), panel.grid = element_blank()) morphalr_clusters_mean(sf = rouen_with_indices, clustering = clusterrouen, cutting = 6) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   cluster   miller_index    dsc     dsr #>   <fct>            <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl> #> 1 cluster 1        0.131  0.118  0.367  #> 2 cluster 2       -0.152 -0.551 -0.632  #> 3 cluster 3       -1.14   1.38   1.38   #> 4 cluster 4       -2.20   3.54   2.92   #> 5 cluster 5        0.991 -0.593 -0.688  #> 6 cluster 6       -1.95  -0.359  0.0322

title: Computing orientations
text: Extracting segments morphal_geom_to_segment() can applied polygon linestring geometries. Default output consists input sf composed segments (.e LINE line composed two points) MULTILINESTRING geometry. Parameter can provides LINESTRING output.

title: Computing orientations
text: Computing morphal_geom_to_segment() can long may useful apply parallel computing.
code: nbcores <- parallel::detectCores() - 1 rouensplit <- rouen_1827 |>   mutate(bloc1000 = 1:nrow(rouen_1827) %/% 1000) |>   group_by(bloc1000) |>   group_split()  rouenparall <- mclapply(X = rouensplit, FUN = morphalr_geom_to_segment, mc.cores = nbcores) rouenparall <- data.table::rbindlist(rouenparall) |>   st_as_sf() |>   select(-bloc1000)  # as LINESTRING rouenparall <- rouenparall |>   st_cast(to = 'LINESTRING')

title: Computing orientations
text: Compute orientations segments morphalr_segment_orientation(). looking default parameters “N” North, results degrees semicircle [-90;90].  Compute orientations segments East looking perpendicular parameters. latter makes possible combine perpendicular orientations, values degrees recalculated quarter circle [0;90].
code: orientations <- morphalr_segment_orientation(sfsegments = rouenline)  orientations |>   ggplot() +   geom_sf(aes(color = orientation)) +   scale_color_viridis_c() +   theme_bw() +   theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(), axis.text = element_blank(), panel.grid = element_blank()) orientations <- morphalr_segment_orientation(sfsegments = rouenline, looking = 'E', perpendicular = TRUE)  orientations |>   ggplot() +   geom_sf(aes(color = orientation)) +   scale_color_viridis_c() +   theme_bw() +   theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(), axis.text = element_blank(), panel.grid = element_blank())

title: Authors and Citation
text: Julie Gravier. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Gravier J (2024). morphalr: Morphological Analysis Archaeology. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://jgravier.github.io/morphalr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {morphalr: Morphological Analysis for Archaeology},   author = {Julie Gravier},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://jgravier.github.io/morphalr/}, }

title: Morphological Analysis for Archaeology
text: package compute morphological indices spatial entities (e.g. parcels, buildings). also provides computation multivariate statistics results (HCA/PCA).

title: Morphological Analysis for Archaeology
text: Package currently exist development github. Install package github:

title: Miller circularity index — morphalr_circularity
text: Compute Miller circularity index polygons.

title: Miller circularity index — morphalr_circularity
text: sfpolygons sf object composed polygons.

title: Miller circularity index — morphalr_circularity
text: sfpoygons index result new column, named miller_index.

title: Miller circularity index — morphalr_circularity
text: \(I_M = \frac{4\pi A_p}{P_p^2}\), \(A_p\) area polygon \(P_{p}\) perimeter. Miller circularity index ratio area polygon theoretical circle perimeter. sense, index also written similarity index circle \(I_M = \frac{A_p}{\pi(\frac{P_p}{2\pi})^2}\). Miller index normalized [0-1].

title: Miller circularity index — morphalr_circularity
text: Robert, Sandrine, Éric Grosso, Pascal Chareille, et Hélène Noizet. 2014. « MorphAL (Morphological Analysis) : un outil d’analyse de morphologie urbaine ». Archéologie de l’espace urbain, édité par Elisabeth Lorans et Xavier Rodier, 451‑63. Perspectives Villes et Territoires. Tours: Presses universitaires François-Rabelais. https://doi.org/10.4000/books.pufr.7717.

title: Clustering of spatial entities — morphalr_clustering
text: Compute clustering spatial entities based HCA distance matrix coordinates PCA.

title: Clustering of spatial entities — morphalr_clustering
text: sf sf object. pca_center logical numeric value indicating whether columns centered dudi.pca(). pca_scale logical value indicating whether columns scaled dudi.pca(). hca_method character string defining clustering method implemented hclust() fastcluster package: "single", "average", "complete", "ward.D", "ward.D2", "mcquitty", "centroid" "median".

title: Clustering of spatial entities — morphalr_clustering
text: clustering object class hclust.

what: Add clusters of spatial entities — morphalr_clusters
title: Add clusters of spatial entities — morphalr_clusters
text: Add clusters spatial entities selected cutting threshold hclust object.

title: Add clusters of spatial entities — morphalr_clusters
Add clusters of spatial entities — morphalr_clusters
text: sf sf object. clustering hclust object, e.g. result morphalr_clustering(). cutting numeric value cutting threshold.

title: Add clusters of spatial entities — morphalr_clusters
text: sf object clusters new column.

what: Mean of center-scale values of columns by cluster — morphalr_clusters_mean
title: Mean of center-scale values of columns by cluster — morphalr_clusters_mean
text: Compute mean center-scale values columns group cluster.

title: Mean of center-scale values of columns by cluster — morphalr_clusters_mean
Mean of center-scale values of columns by cluster — morphalr_clusters_mean
text: sf sf object. clustering hclust object, e.g. result morphalr_clustering(). cutting numeric value cutting threshold.

title: Mean of center-scale values of columns by cluster — morphalr_clusters_mean
text: tibble.

title: Morphological complexity — morphalr_complexity
text: Compute morphological complexity index polygons.

title: Morphological complexity — morphalr_complexity
text: sfpolygons sf object composed polygons.

title: Morphological complexity — morphalr_complexity
text: sfpoygons index new column, named complexity_index.

title: Morphological complexity — morphalr_complexity
text: \(I_c = \frac{N_{pv}}{P_p}\), \(N_{pv}\) number vertices polygon \(P_p\) perimeter.

title: Morphological complexity — morphalr_complexity
text: Marie, Maxime, Abdelkrim Bensaid, et Daniel Delahaye. 2009. « Le rôle de la distance dans l’organisation des pratiques et des paysages agricoles : l’exemple du fonctionnement des exploitations laitières dans l’arc atlantique ». Cybergeo: European Journal Geography. https://doi.org/10.4000/cybergeo.22366.

title: Distance to convex hull — morphalr_dsc
text: Compute distance polygon convex hull (DSC).

title: Distance to convex hull — morphalr_dsc
text: sfpolygons sf object composed polygons.

title: Distance to convex hull — morphalr_dsc
text: sfpoygons DSC new column.

title: Distance to convex hull — morphalr_dsc
text: \(DSC = 1 - \frac{A_p}{A_{ch}}\), \(A_p\) area polygon \(A_{ch}\) area convex hull. DSC normalized [0-1].

title: Distance to convex hull — morphalr_dsc
text: Robert, Sandrine, Éric Grosso, Pascal Chareille, et Hélène Noizet. 2014. « MorphAL (Morphological Analysis) : un outil d’analyse de morphologie urbaine ». Archéologie de l’espace urbain, édité par Elisabeth Lorans et Xavier Rodier, 451‑63. Perspectives Villes et Territoires. Tours: Presses universitaires François-Rabelais. https://doi.org/10.4000/books.pufr.7717.

what: Distance to minimal bounding rectangle — morphalr_dsr
title: Distance to minimal bounding rectangle — morphalr_dsr
text: Compute distance polygon minimal bounding rectangle (DSR).

title: Distance to minimal bounding rectangle — morphalr_dsr
Distance to minimal bounding rectangle — morphalr_dsr
text: sfpolygons sf object composed polygons.

title: Distance to minimal bounding rectangle — morphalr_dsr
text: sfpoygons DSR new column.

title: Distance to minimal bounding rectangle — morphalr_dsr
text: \(DSR = 1 - \frac{A_p}{A_{mbb}}\), \(A_p\) area polygon \(A_{mbb}\) area minimal oriented bounding box (rectangle). DSR normalized [0-1].

title: Distance to minimal bounding rectangle — morphalr_dsr
text: Ali, Atef Bel Hadj. 2001. « Qualité géométrique des entités géographiques surfaciques. Application à l’appariement et définition d’une typologie des écarts geométriques ». Phdthesis, université Gustave Effeil ; Anciennement Université de Marne La vallée. https://hal.science/tel-03244834, p. 92. Robert, Sandrine, Éric Grosso, Pascal Chareille, et Hélène Noizet. 2014. « MorphAL (Morphological Analysis) : un outil d’analyse de morphologie urbaine ». Archéologie de l’espace urbain, édité par Elisabeth Lorans et Xavier Rodier, 451‑63. Perspectives Villes et Territoires. Tours: Presses universitaires François-Rabelais. https://doi.org/10.4000/books.pufr.7717.

what: Segments of polygons or lines — morphalr_geom_to_segment
title: Segments of polygons or lines — morphalr_geom_to_segment
text: Extraction segments (LINE) composing polygons lines.

title: Segments of polygons or lines — morphalr_geom_to_segment
Segments of polygons or lines — morphalr_geom_to_segment
text: sfobject sf object (sfc POLYGON LINESTRING). type sfc sf output: "MULTILINESTRING" "LINESTRING" (default "MULTILINESTRING").

title: Segments of polygons or lines — morphalr_geom_to_segment
text: sf object composed segments.

title: Segments of polygons or lines — morphalr_geom_to_segment
text: computing "MULTILINESTRING", output equivalent sfobject GEOMETRY multiple segments LINES MULTILINESTRING. computing "LINESTRING", output long sf sfobject row correspond segment GEOMETRY LINE.

title: Segments of polygons or lines — morphalr_geom_to_segment
text: Diego Hernangómez

title: Minimal oriented bounding rectangles — morphalr_mbboxoriented
text: Create minimal oriented bounding rectangles polygons.

title: Minimal oriented bounding rectangles — morphalr_mbboxoriented
text: sfpolygon sf object composed polygons.

title: Minimal oriented bounding rectangles — morphalr_mbboxoriented
text: sf object composed minimal oriented bounding rectangles.

title: Segment orientation — morphalr_segment_orientation
text: Compute orientations segments (.e. lines).

title: Segment orientation — morphalr_segment_orientation
text: sfsegments sf object sfc "MULTILINESTRING" "LINESTRING". looking look direction parameter: "N" North "E" East (default North). perpendicular logical parameter. TRUE, perpendiculars orientations [0;90] (.e. [-90;0]) degrees recalculated interval [0;90] (default FALSE).

title: Segment orientation — morphalr_segment_orientation
